Package org.openwms.core.uaa.admin

Interface SecurityService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SecurityServiceImpl
public interface SecurityService
A SecurityService defines functionality to handle SecurityObjects, especially Grants.
Since:
0.1
Version:
0.2
Author:
Heiko Scherrer
